attributes.action:
Vote of no confidence in all parties.
Magna carta article 61
attributes.background:
The people of the United Kingdom voted to leave the EU on Thursday 23 June, 2016.
The UK government have gone back on what we voted on. 
Mrs May has gone back on her promise, she now wants a extension. 
We want a no deal!

Article 61 of the magna carta lawful rebellion. This will be enforced

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
